events.title: Pints for Pits Adoption Event
events.description: Come celebrate St. Pitty's Day with Adore-A-Bull Rescue at MadTree!

events.title: St. Patrick's Day
events.description: Happy green beer day! Well, we won't be serving any green beer, but we will have Mac the Willis Irish Red and Black Forest Milk Stout so you can get your Irish(ish) fix.

events.title: Cincinnati Rollergirls
events.description: Come out to Cincinnati Gardens to watch the Rollergirls play a double-header against New Hampshire & Gem City. After the game head to the taproom for the after party.

events.title: Ales for Autism
events.description: The Autism Society of Greater Cincinnati is the official Charity of the Month for MadTree for the month of April. We're kicking off support by giving $1 from every draft beer to the Autism Society on Tuesday, April 8th. In addition, all the dollars tossed up on the grates and $1 from all headbands sold in the month of April will be donated to the society.

events.title: Ales for Autism
events.description: Join us April 15th at Firehouse Grill to help raise money and awareness for the Autism Society of Greater Cincinnati during Autism Awareness Month. The need now is even greater as 1 in 68 US children has an autism spectrum disorder. $1 from every MadTree draft pint sold will go towards the cause. Cheers!

events.title: Hoppy 4-18… because we can't wait until 4-20
events.description: Cause it's Friday. You ain't got no job. And you ain't got shit to do. Join us Friday April 18th at Oakley Pub and Grill as we tap the best hoppy beers MadTree has to offer. Sprye Pale Ale, PsycHOPathy IPA, Rounding Third Red IPA, Identity Crisis Hoppy Porter, and Galaxy High Imperial IPA. Ima get you hoppy tonight.

events.title: Ales for Autism at Arthur's Cafe
events.description: Join us April 22nd at Arthur's Cafe to help raise money and awareness for the Autism Society of Greater Cincinnati during Autism Awareness Month. The need now is even greater as 1 in 68 US children has an autism spectrum disorder. $1 from every MadTree draft pint sold will go towards the cause. As well, bartenders will be donating tips! Cheers!
